casebody.data:
[Cite as 02/25/2003 Case Announcements, 2003-Ohio-810.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

February 25, 2003

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

1999-1878. State v. Williams.

Lucas C.P. No. CR991366. This cause is pending before the court as a death penalty appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Lucas County. Upon consideration of appellee’s motion for continuance of oral argument currently scheduled for April 15, 2003,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for continuance of oral argument be, and hereby is, denied.
